fields_of_interest: Education and training, Energy, Environment, Climate Action, Communication
eu_initiatives: We are members of the European Litter Prevention Association, which may indirectly influence policy through having a clear position statement on how the circular economy and extended producer responsibility can best be used to bring about behaviour change.
organisation_name: Keep Northern Ireland Beautiful (Keep NI Beautiful)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership:
Keep Northern Ireland Beautiful is a member of: 
 
Northern Ireland Environment Link 
Northern Ireland Council for Voluntary Action 
The Foundation for Environmental Education 
Stop Climate Chaos NI 
Clean Europe Network 
European Litter Prevention Association 
Northern Ireland Chamber of Commerce
goals__remit:
Keep Northern Ireland Beautiful aims to inspire people to take responsibility for creating cleaner greener and more sustainable communities. 
 
We want to make it socially unacceptable to drop litter by changing behaviour and creating a sense of civic pride. 
 
We want to create citizens who will minimise their impact on the environment, working to reduce consumption, increase reuse and recycling and participate in positive local actions. 
 
We will do this through education programmes, supporting public engagement and raising standards in local environmental quality.  Where necessary we will work with enforcement authorities to facilitate robust responses to litterers. 
 
We operate within Northern Ireland.
legal_status: Charity and Company Ltd by Guarantee
